jdbcDataSource.name: CCR - cRepository - Healthcare Patient Summary
jdbcDataSource.query: SELECT * FROM vw_ccr_event_summary WHERE patientId = '<%=request.patientId%>' --AND pe.deactivationReasonId IS NULL AND ID = '<%=request.ID%>' --AND pe.deactivationReasonId IS NULL ORDER BY resolutionTime DESC

jdbcDataSource.name: CCR - cRepository Image Search
jdbcDataSource.query:
SELECT DISTINCT idNumber_9LV7R as 'PatientID', sD_userId_L2ZQP as 'user', document.documentid as 'documentId', uniqueId as 'uniqueId', 'Wound Image' as 'FormTitle', CAST(dateSubmitted_L0HOZ AS smalldatetime) as 'date', filename as 'filename', mimeTypeFk as 'Type', data as 'data'
FROM V_DOCUMENT document inner join v_AllDocumentIdentifier allDoc on allDoc.documentId = document.documentId inner join V2_DOCUMENTMETADATA_0Z14K metaData on metaData.documentId = document.documentId inner join V2_DCMMTDT_0Z14K_P_PTNID_6KYRZ metaData_patient on metaData_patient.V2_DOCUMENTMETADATA_0Z14K = metaData.V2_DOCUMENTMETADATA_0Z14K inner join v2_GBLrvwSmmrycmpnnt_83RT5 surgical on surgical.DOCUMENTID = allDoc.documentId inner join v2_CCRCNWndStInfTrmtSrgc_8M0$D surgicallink on surgicallink.documentid = surgical.documentId inner join v2_CCR#ITS_8M0$D_ActnLst_IYW3H surgwound ON surgicallink.v2_CCRCNWndStInfTrmtSrgc_8M0$D = surgwound.v2_CCRCNWndStInfTrmtSrgc_8M0$D left outer join v2_GBLrSc_83RT5_atchm_HNKRDFH atchm ON surgical.v2_GBLrvwSmmrycmpnnt_83RT5 = surgical.v2_GBLrvwSmmrycmpnnt_83RT5 left outer join [FAS_Attachment] fasAT ON fasAT.uniqueId = atchm.formsInternalId_MXZPJ where filename is NOT NULL and idNumber_9LV7R = '<%=request.getNodeValue("//PatientId")%>'

jdbcDataSource.name: CCRImageDisplay
jdbcDataSource.query:
SELECT DISTINCT filename as name, data as value, mimeTypeFk as mimeType, uniqueId as 'uniqueId'
FROM V_DOCUMENT document inner join v_AllDocumentIdentifier allDoc on allDoc.documentId = document.documentId inner join V2_DOCUMENTMETADATA_0Z14K metaData on metaData.documentId = document.documentId inner join V2_DCMMTDT_0Z14K_P_PTNID_6KYRZ metaData_patient on metaData_patient.V2_DOCUMENTMETADATA_0Z14K = metaData.V2_DOCUMENTMETADATA_0Z14K inner join v2_GBLrvwSmmrycmpnnt_83RT5 surgical on surgical.DOCUMENTID = allDoc.documentId inner join v2_CCRCNWndStInfTrmtSrgc_8M0$D surgicallink on surgicallink.documentid = surgical.documentId inner join v2_CCR#ITS_8M0$D_ActnLst_IYW3H surgwound ON surgicallink.v2_CCRCNWndStInfTrmtSrgc_8M0$D = surgwound.v2_CCRCNWndStInfTrmtSrgc_8M0$D left outer join v2_GBLrSc_83RT5_atchm_HNKRDFH atchm ON surgical.v2_GBLrvwSmmrycmpnnt_83RT5 = surgical.v2_GBLrvwSmmrycmpnnt_83RT5 left outer join [FAS_Attachment] fasAT ON fasAT.uniqueId = atchm.formsInternalId_MXZPJ WHERE uniqueId = '<%=request.getNodeValue("//uniqueId")%>'

jdbcDataSource.name: WICPDFInNewWindowDatasource
jdbcDataSource.query: SELECT ADMN.SDMAF_modelId_Z#STW AS modelID ,TPTL.TreatmentProtocolName_WSW2X ,TPTL.VersionDate_CV1UL AS VDate ,fasAT.filename as name ,'' as mimeType ,fasAT.uniqueId as 'uniqueId' ,fasAT.identifier AS 'Identifier' ,fasAT.data AS value FROM v2_WICAdmnstrtnFrm_DWQIL ADMN INNER JOIN v2_WICAdFr_DWQIL_TrtPrt_L9OVK TPTL ON ADMN.v2_WICAdmnstrtnFrm_DWQIL = TPTL.v2_WICAdmnstrtnFrm_DWQIL JOIN v2_WICAdFr_DWQIL_atchm_HTVE2HH ATACH ON TPTL.v2_WICAdFr_DWQIL_TrtPrt_L9OVK = ATACH.v2_WICAdFr_DWQIL_TrtPrt_L9OVK AND ATACH.ordering = 0 INNER JOIN v2_DocumentMetaData_0Z14K META ON META.DOCUMENTID = ADMN.DOCUMENTID INNER JOIN DocumentIdentifier DI on DI.DOCUMENTID = META.DOCUMENTID INNER JOIN v_Document FINFO ON FINFO.DocumentId = META.DOCUMENTID left outer join [FAS_Attachment] fasAT ON fasAT.uniqueId = ATACH.formsInternalId_MXZPJ WHERE fasAT.uniqueId = '<%=request.getNodeValue("//DocumentId")%>'

jdbcDataSource.name: WICPDFDataSource
jdbcDataSource.query: SELECT ADMN.SDMAF_modelId_Z#STW AS modelID ,TPTL.TreatmentProtocolName_WSW2X ,TPTL.VersionDate_CV1UL AS VDate ,fasAT.filename as name ,'' as mimeType ,fasAT.uniqueId as 'uniqueId' ,fasAT.identifier AS 'Identifier' ,fasAT.data AS value FROM v2_WICAdmnstrtnFrm_DWQIL ADMN INNER JOIN v2_WICAdFr_DWQIL_TrtPrt_L9OVK TPTL ON ADMN.v2_WICAdmnstrtnFrm_DWQIL = TPTL.v2_WICAdmnstrtnFrm_DWQIL JOIN v2_WICAdFr_DWQIL_atchm_HTVE2HH ATACH ON TPTL.v2_WICAdFr_DWQIL_TrtPrt_L9OVK = ATACH.v2_WICAdFr_DWQIL_TrtPrt_L9OVK AND ATACH.ordering = 0 INNER JOIN v2_DocumentMetaData_0Z14K META ON META.DOCUMENTID = ADMN.DOCUMENTID INNER JOIN DocumentIdentifier DI on DI.DOCUMENTID = META.DOCUMENTID INNER JOIN v_Document FINFO ON FINFO.DocumentId = META.DOCUMENTID left outer join [FAS_Attachment] fasAT ON fasAT.uniqueId = ATACH.formsInternalId_MXZPJ WHERE fasAT.uniqueId = '<%=request.getNodeValue("//DocumentId")%>'

filter.name: Referral Summary
filter.description: The summary of the patient's journey through healthcare pathways
filter.body:
Referral Checklist

1. Enrollment Review

Currently enrolled on the following pathways: Deactivated Active

2. Tasks Completed

The following tasks were preformed during your last visit:
Task When Assignee Status

3. Past Activity

The following tasks were preformed during your last visit:
Task When Assignee Status

4. Global Forms

The following tasks were preformed during your last visit:
Task When Assignee Status

5. Consent

  • Involve your client, ensure they are informed and gain consent to share their health information
  • Relevant documentation can be found by the links provided
  • Consent documentation

6. Complete Duration of Care

  • List of all the patients duration of care and pathway enrolments
  • Completed duration of care episodes
    • Physiotherapy pathway - Enrolled by Act Clinician on 27-Mar-2014
      Active
  • Historical list of durations
    • Occupational therapy pathway
    • Appointment Pathway
  • Patient Pathways

configuration.name: OpenWICPdfInNewWindow
configuration.description: Opens up the Intake CDR document with the id. Uses a filter to ensure the document is provided in a frame for when opening in a new window

configuration.name: OpenWICPdf
configuration.description: Opens up the WiC PDF document with the id.
